--- hint.sql
@{a=1}
GRAPH FinGraph
RETURN 1 AS x

--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  Hint: &ast.Hint{
    Rbrace:  5,
    Records: []*ast.HintRecord{
      &ast.HintRecord{
        Key: &ast.Path{
          Idents: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 2,
              NameEnd: 3,
              Name:    "a",
            },
          },
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 4,
          ValueEnd: 5,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    Graph:             7,
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 13,
          NameEnd: 21,
          Name:    "FinGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Query: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturn{
            Return: 22,
            Items:  []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 29,
                  ValueEnd: 30,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    31,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 34,
                    NameEnd: 35,
                    Name:    "x",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
@{a=1} GRAPH FinGraph RETURN 1 AS x
